item.description:
We'll have our December meeup on Sunday, December 20th from 11am - 1pm and to celebrate the holidays we'll do a Yankee Swap.

Please bring a wrapped gift for each dog you bring so there will be enough gifts for every pup. I'll have some refreshments for the humans and if anyone would like to bring anything, please feel free.

First time attendees, please check in at the front desk. We require proof of vaccinations for the rabies, distemper and canine cough. If anyone would like to schedule a pre-holiday day at the spa, let me know and we'll be happy to set up a grooming appointment.

Looking forward to seeing all of you!!

Happy Holidays!!
Agni & All Your Best Friends in Wakefield
item.name: HOLIDAY YANKEE SWAP!
